metadata.name: !!Mod Config Menu
metadata.description:
The Mod Config Menu is a mod that adds a new menu to the game that enables other mods to provide a simple and easy way for the player to configure them.
This mod does not do much on its own, to get into the real action you should download a mod which supports this menu.
[h1]Mods that support Mod Config Menu[/h1] Check out this collection: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1659279635
[h1]Documentation[/h1] Read this discussion: https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1603631350/1741103267296589223/
[h1]Navigation[/h1]
Keyboard: Use the arrow keys or WASD keys to move around, backspace or Q to go back, E space or enter to select an item.
By default you can open the menu by pressing L.
F10 will also always open the menu, this cannot be changed.
Controller: Both control sticks and the dpad can be used to move around, press B to go back, A to select an item.
By default you can open the menu by pressing down the right control stick.
[h1]Mirror[/h1] https://piber20.com/d/bap/Mod%20Config%20Menu.zip
